channel.title: Devops on SATHEE
channel.description: Recent content in Devops on SATHEE

item.title: Devops
item.description: PRODUCTION BRANCH TO SERVER The deployment of code from production branch in to the live servers. Description: - 1)There are six different types of servers for production. Each server contains different services. 2)The backend code is push on every server. FLOW DIAGRAM:- Description: - 1)The developer merges the final code from their branch into master branch. 2)Then production branch contains ci/cd pipeline for deployment. DEPLOYMENT FLOW:- Description: - 1)The four repos Backend, category, partner and Ingestion are deployed every week.
